sentence.Network_en: Namibian law permits ranchers to shoot cheetahs to protect their livestock.
sentence.Network_cn: 纳米比亚法律允许农场主射杀猎豹以保护家畜。

sentence.Network_en: We're fattening the livestock up for slaughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们正在催肥牲畜待宰杀.

sentence.Network_en: Both men and livestock are flourishing.

entry.def: Animals such as cattle and sheep which are kept on a farm are referred to as livestock.

example.ex: The heavy rains and flooding killed scores of livestock.
example.tran: 暴雨和大水淹死了许多牲口。

means.word_mean: 1. not used technically; any animals kept for use or profit

auth_sentence.content: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The fate of the livestock is one immediate challenge.

auth_sentence.content: You're getting livestock from a very large area.

auth_sentence.content: They may also scavenge or kill the livestock itself.

Sentence.sentence: The challenge is that an increase in animal-based production will require more land and resources, as livestock (牲畜)farming demands extensive land use.

sentences.en: At the county fair last year, prizes were given for the best farm products and livestock.
sentences.cn: 在去年全县交易会上, 最好的农产品和家畜都得了奖。

jushi.english: At the county fair last year, prizes were given for the best farm products and livestock.
jushi.chinese: 在去年全县交易会上,最好的农产品和家畜都得了奖。
